Production Co: Levantine Films, MRC Film, Gil Netter, Paramount+, Landline Pictures
Synopsis: JERRY & MARGE GO LARGE is inspired by the remarkable true story of retiree Jerry Selbee, who discovers a mathematical loophole in the Massachusetts lottery and, with the help of his wife, Marge, wins millions and uses the money to revive their small Michigan town.
Title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
